Articles.Content:
Hey all i saw this game mentioned online, played the demo, fell in love instantly.

I donated the full amount after about 3 days of playing the demo, that was 3 days ago and tonight i accomplished my first lunar landing with kerbal return splash down.

WOW that was a really good feeling i just sat back and smiled, it\'s been a long time since i played a game that seemed impossible at first but, which after serious passion to play i began to unravel.

i havent sussed the whole thing yet, but i am now a devotee of this brilliant, fun and above all simple (reach space) game.

i cannot wait to see what the future holds.

SEE YOU OUT THERE.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Ignore Caesar, he may be a duck for all I know.

Apples and Bananas!

-Arcane
